reviews.text: With lots of humor and excellent casting definately deserve ur 2 hour time. Show will not disappoint you rather give you what in actual life happens with people
Wow what an amazing movie, star cast also played a good role in movie.

Must watch. A really fresh movie without a vanilla ending. There are only a few who get to achieve their dreams, rest make compromises with their situations.This movie is not about those role-models successful people who seldom exist in societies, this movie is about those uncountable number of people who see dreams and but couldn't realize their dreams. Someday somewhere they make a pact with their fate and let themselves flow with the current.

One of the best and well written movie i have watched..a pure cinema where content is the actual driving force and you laugh at the situation and you feel for the characters , smart use of music in the situation and music is like the cherry on the cake for some of the situations

DON'T MISS IT! 'Kanpuriye' which revolves around the lives of people who struggle to come in town and make a living. The movie is about that bittersweet moment in our collective lives that define who we become. Perfect light hearted comedy which definitely should have been released on big screen. Definitely deserves 2 hrs of your lives. Munna bhai did it again flawlessly. Vijay and Aparshakti both did seamlessly. Acting, direction, plot were 9/10. This movie is for all. Made under the charm of Kanpur.

Well finally I watched this movie and I must say amazing job done by all the actors. A big shout out to all the cast & crew who actually went to the exact locations of Kanpur and shot the movie. Ashish the director & also the writer has captured some actual facts of human behaviour and especially how people of Kanpur will behave. Though the ending I felt was little incomplete but overall felt satisfied.
One of my favorite movie which I really like to watch again and again
It is one hell of a movie.Lifestyle of people of kanpur is incredibly shown. Must watch.

This muvi gives us a dose of reality without going super serious about it and thats what is great about it. Dreams come and go but u gotta go on, move on for something new and make peace with it. This muvi is very badly rated(6.5) and that just sums up the bad taste of people. All actors played their part very well, and it had feeling of kanpur too with the real houses used for shooting. More movies of such genre should be made. Simply very happy for director Ashish aryan, looking forward for his future projects.
Thats amazing and joyfull😍😍 i m very happy ......

It's an amazing anthology representing lives of Kanpur's people. How they easily dream about going to big cities by leaving their hometown soon. Many of them successfully leave but many of them fail to do so. Kanpuriye is a solace to those burning hearts who failed to leave Kanpur to pursue their big dreams.Obviously it's a hidden gem because it's really a well made movie. The drama and comedy of errors shown in this movie is somehow related all our lives.
If any younster wants to demonization, then please watch this movie but if not then its my humble request please please for god sake don't watch these type of movies.

Kanpuriye narrates the story of three Kanpur residents, Jaitun (Aparshakti), Jugnu (Harsh Mayar), and Vijay (Divyenndu Sharma), who all dream of escaping Kanpur to lead the good, prosperous life one day. But their families are against them leaving their hometown, or the city of broken dreams, as they define it. Must watch movie

Kanpuriye narrates the story of three Kanpur residents, Jaitun (Aparshakti), Jugnu (Harsh Mayar), and Vijay (Divyenndu Sharma), who all dream of escaping Kanpur to lead the good, prosperous life one day. But their families are against them leaving their hometown, or the city of broken dreams, as they define it.L

This movie delivers what it promises. The audience will connect to this movie from the very starting, Vijay Raaz, Devyandu, Aparshakti khurrana has done justice to their roles. They have lived those characters on the screen like megastars. Kanpuriye caters to the audience of middle-class family, their challenges, their hustle to achieve their dreams. All the people will connect to this masterpiece on a personal level.

This movie shows that how some love stories remain incomplete even after being complete in themselves , Tells that how some dreams don't only cost money they also cost negotiations from parents , Tells us that how to achieve something big in life, One can do the dumbest thing without thinking over it & Overall this movie is a very true to life movie inspired from many stories around us ✌🏻

It's an ode to the common man, who's often stifled by the limitations of his life and can do nothing to change it. The protagonists in the film are no heroes, they are perfectly 'average' (notice the oxymoron).
The storyline relates to our life and inspires us to take big decisions to fulfill our big dreams. Aparshakti Khurana never fails to impress us with his role. Highly recommended to all.

The movie definitely revolves around Kanpur as the name suggests, but also has a storyline you'll be able to relate to. It isn't something that you've never come across in any of the previous Bollywood movies, but yes they've definitely tried something different this time. There are three main characters, where in the end all of them come to the bigger picture, and all of their personal livestories are brought to the limelight in such a way that all of them are somehow linked to each other.

This film definitely have the capability of holding the uninterrupted attention of its viewers and keep them interested throughout the movie. The movie revolves around three people who are trying to settle themselves in the city. There struggles are real and audience can easily relate. But the movie is light hearted because it has perfect touch of comedy. The movie also contains the essence of kanpur.
The storyline as well as the acting was superb. The actors were equally brilliant.
It has a very good combination of drama and comedy , the direction , casting and the plot all together are pretty impressive , worth giving a watch

Its a story about a group of boys who dream big. All actors played their part very well, and it had feeling of kanpur too with the real houses used for shooting.
Story of group of boys who dream big. All actors played their part very well, and it had feeling of kanpur too with the real houses used for shooting.

Despite the rooted setting of Kanpur, the concerns that the storyteller presents are quite universal - the pressure of an Indian man to be a breadwinner, do a 'conventional, secure' job, to have a promising salary, the dreams of settling down in a big city, the conservatism of Indian parents and their inability to come to terms with premarital relationships. The men in the film are sometimes selfish, think of themselves above their families. Just as they aim for higher goals in life even it means a few 'unlawful' acts, reality hits them hard.
The story is about a group of boys who dreams big. It is a fun movie. Do watch.
Amazing movie. Totally worth it. Do go and watch this movie. You'll have one hell of a time.

Kanpuriye finds the right balance of familiar actors and effective casting. The underdog vibe of the film is its lifeline and the cast understands the same. Aparshakti Khurana proves to be as effective (though not as versatile) as his popular actor-sibling Ayushman with humour. The sarcasm in his dialogue delivery, the variety in his mannerisms and the ability to get into the skin of the role complement the film so well.

Kanpuriye is a nice and very realistic movie but can not be called an outstanding one nor the one which can steal audience's heart. But still a decent movie you can watch it but it's a one time watch film. So if you have tons of free time in your hand then you can watch it.

Living in a small city of Kanpur the film is about three young aspiring guys wanting to fulfill their dreams. A Helpless lover, A Struggling lawyer & A passionate wanna be Chef sets the three different stories showcasing Love, Struggle, Emotion, Fate, Destiny & Drama. The cast is ideal Divyenndu, Aparshati Khurana & Harsh Mayar (National Award Winner) are in the leads and nailed it totally supported well by rest of the cast members. Vijay Raz is as good as always as stubborn yet caring father. Writer/Director Ashish Aryan looks promising and did a fair job. The film at first looked liked a regular small town comedy but rather it is an emotional saga picturized with every possible details closer to the reality of a middle class common people.
It is one hell of a movie. Lifestyle of people of kanpur is portrayed incredibly
One of the best and well written movies I have watched. Perfect light hearted comedy with bittersweet moments that we go through in life. Must watch

After half a century of monopolising the top spot, Citizen Kane was beginning to look smugly inviolable. Call it Schadenfreude, but let's rejoice that this now conventional and ritualised symbol of 'the greatest' has finally been taken down a peg. The accession of Vertigo is hardly in the nature of a coup d'état. Tying for 11th place in 1972, Hitchcock's masterpiece steadily inched up the poll over the next three decades, and by 2002 was clearly the heir apparent. Still, even ardent Wellesians should feel gratified at the modest revolution - if only for the proof that film canons (and the versions of history they legitimate) are not completely fossilised.There may be no larger significance in the bare fact that a couple of films made in California 17 years apart have traded numerical rankings on a whimsically impressionistic list. Yet the human urge to interpret chance phenomena will not be denied, and Vertigo is a crafty, duplicitous machine for spinning meaning...
Good actors, good direction, & dialogues but very stretched & boring... Wasted entire movie!
